LanguageData.ToiletStallDoor.label: porta do box
LanguageData.ToiletStallDoor.description: Porta fina que bloqueia a linha de visão das pessoas. Não evita a perda de calor.
LanguageData.ToiletStallDoor_Blueprint.label: stall door (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToiletStallDoor_Frame.label: stall door (building)
LanguageData.ToiletStallDoor_Frame.description: Thin door which only blocks line of sight to people using bathroom fixtures. Does not create new rooms or prevent heat loss.
LanguageData.PitLatrine.label: latrina
LanguageData.PitLatrine.description: Latrina é um tipo de vaso que deposita cocô em um buraco no chão. Não precisa de água.
LanguageData.PitLatrine_Blueprint.label: latrine (blueprint)
LanguageData.PitLatrine_Blueprint_Install.label: latrine (blueprint)
LanguageData.PitLatrine_Frame.label: latrine (building)
LanguageData.PitLatrine_Frame.description: A pit latrine that collects faeces in a hole in the ground. Must be emptied manually, or can be plumbed.\n14L per use
LanguageData.PrimitiveWell.label: poço de água primitivo
LanguageData.PrimitiveWell.description: Acessa água subterrânea. A água deve ser transportada para um balde de água antes de poder ser usada para lavar ou beber.
LanguageData.PrimitiveWell_Blueprint.label: primitive well (blueprint)
LanguageData.PrimitiveWell_Frame.label: primitive well (building)
LanguageData.PrimitiveWell_Frame.description: Accesses ground water. Water must be hauled to a water tub before it can be used for washing or drinking.
LanguageData.WashBucket.label: balde de água
LanguageData.WashBucket.description: Balde de água usada para lavar.
LanguageData.WashBucket_Blueprint.label: water tub (blueprint)
LanguageData.WashBucket_Blueprint_Install.label: water tub (blueprint)
LanguageData.WashBucket_Frame.label: water tub (building)
LanguageData.WashBucket_Frame.description: Tub of water used for personal hygiene. Must be regularly refilled with fresh water, also fills with rain water. Can also be used for drinking if thirst is enabled.
LanguageData.WaterTrough.label: bebedouro de animais
LanguageData.WaterTrough.description: Bebedouro usado por animais, uma caixa de serviço com válvula que enche automaticamente a água quando o nível está baixo, reabastece também na chuva.
LanguageData.WaterTrough_Blueprint.label: Water Trough (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaterTrough_Blueprint_Install.label: Water Trough (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaterTrough_Frame.label: Water Trough (building)
LanguageData.WaterTrough_Frame.description: Trough of water used by animals, a service box with a ballcock valve automatically refills the water when the level is low, also refills in rain.
LanguageData.LitterBox.label: caixa de areia
LanguageData.LitterBox.description: Uma caixa de areia para depositar cocô e urina de pequenos animais.
LanguageData.LitterBox_Blueprint.label: litter box (blueprint)
LanguageData.LitterBox_Blueprint_Install.label: litter box (blueprint)
LanguageData.LitterBox_Frame.label: litter box (building)
LanguageData.LitterBox_Frame.description: An indoor faeces and urine collection box for small animals.
LanguageData.BurnPit.label: queima de resíduo
LanguageData.BurnPit.description: Elimina o cocô, queimando-o como combustível. Também pode ser usado para descartar cadáveres e outros detritos. Os colonos podem ficar doentes se passarem muito tempo perto da queima de resíduos.
LanguageData.BurnPit_Blueprint.label: burn pit (blueprint)
LanguageData.BurnPit_Frame.label: burn pit (building)
LanguageData.BurnPit_Frame.description: Eliminates fecal sludge by burning it as fuel. Can also be used for disposing of corpses or other detritus. Colonists may become sick if they spend too long near burning waste.
LanguageData.BasinStuff.label: pia
LanguageData.BasinStuff.description: pia do banheiro limpo e simples. Instruções vendidas separadamente.
LanguageData.BasinStuff_Blueprint.label: basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.BasinStuff_Blueprint_Install.label: basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.BasinStuff_Frame.label: basin (building)
LanguageData.BasinStuff_Frame.description: Clean and simple bathroom basin for keeping your hands clean after using the toilet.
LanguageData.Fountain.label: bebedouro
LanguageData.Fountain.description: Uma bebedouro de água usada para beber e lavar.
LanguageData.Fountain_Blueprint.label: fountain (blueprint)
LanguageData.Fountain_Blueprint_Install.label: fountain (blueprint)
LanguageData.Fountain_Frame.label: fountain (building)
LanguageData.Fountain_Frame.description: A water fountain used for drinking and washing.
LanguageData.KitchenSink.label: pia de cozinha
LanguageData.KitchenSink.description: Tudo menos uma pia de cozinha. Aumenta a limpeza do local.
LanguageData.KitchenSink_Blueprint.label: kitchen sink (blueprint)
LanguageData.KitchenSink_Blueprint_Install.label: kitchen sink (blueprint)
LanguageData.KitchenSink_Frame.label: kitchen sink (building)
LanguageData.KitchenSink_Frame.description: Everything but a kitchen sink. Increases room cleanliness.
LanguageData.ToiletStuff.label: vaso sanitário
LanguageData.ToiletStuff.description: Aparelho de saneamento utilizado para a eliminação de urina e cocô.
LanguageData.ToiletStuff_Blueprint.label: toilet (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToiletStuff_Blueprint_Install.label: toilet (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToiletStuff_Frame.label: toilet (building)
LanguageData.ToiletStuff_Frame.description: Sanitation fixture used for the disposal of human urine and faeces.\n14L per use
LanguageData.ToiletAdv.description: Aparelho de saneamento utilizado para a eliminação de urina e cocô.
LanguageData.ToiletAdv_Blueprint.label: ToiletAdv (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToiletAdv_Blueprint_Install.label: ToiletAdv (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToiletAdv_Frame.label: ToiletAdv (building)
LanguageData.ToiletAdv_Frame.description: Comfortable, self cleaning, unblockable, super efficient smart toilet. Provides the optimum multi-functional experience with automatic cleansing and deodorization.\n7L per use
LanguageData.ToiletAdvStuff.label: vaso sanitário
LanguageData.ToiletAdvStuff.description: Aparelho de saneamento utilizado para a eliminação de urina e cocô.
LanguageData.ToiletAdvStuff_Blueprint.label: smart toilet (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToiletAdvStuff_Blueprint_Install.label: smart toilet (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToiletAdvStuff_Frame.label: smart toilet (building)
LanguageData.ToiletAdvStuff_Frame.description: Comfortable, self cleaning, unblockable, super efficient smart toilet. Provides the optimum multi-functional experience with automatic cleansing and deodorization.\n7L per use
LanguageData.BathMat.label: tapete de banheiro
LanguageData.BathMat.description: Um pequeno tapete usado ao lado de uma banheira para absorver água.
LanguageData.BathMat_Blueprint.label: Bath Mat (blueprint)
LanguageData.BathMat_Blueprint_Install.label: Bath Mat (blueprint)
LanguageData.BathMat_Frame.label: Bath Mat (building)
LanguageData.BathMat_Frame.description: A small mat used next to a bathtub to absorb water.
LanguageData.BathtubStuff.label: banheira
LanguageData.BathtubStuff.description: Banheira, um grande recipiente aberto para a água, em que uma pessoa pode lavar seu corpo.
LanguageData.BathtubStuff_Blueprint.label: bathtub (blueprint)
LanguageData.BathtubStuff_Blueprint_Install.label: bathtub (blueprint)
LanguageData.BathtubStuff_Frame.label: bathtub (building)
LanguageData.BathtubStuff_Frame.description: Slow to use, but very comfortable. Can be heated by placing an adjacent campfire or log boiler, or via plumbed hot water tanks. Does not require a sewage outlet.\n190L per wash
LanguageData.ShowerStuff.label: chuveiro
LanguageData.ShowerStuff.description: Possui uma grande ducha de 110mm 4 pulverizado para relaxar os músculos doloridos.
LanguageData.ShowerStuff_Blueprint.label: shower (blueprint)
LanguageData.ShowerStuff_Blueprint_Install.label: shower (blueprint)
LanguageData.ShowerStuff_Frame.label: shower (building)
LanguageData.ShowerStuff_Frame.description: Simple shower. Requires water from water towers. Can be heated via plumbed hot water tanks. Does not require a sewage outlet.\n65L per wash
LanguageData.ShowerSimple.label: chuveiro simples
LanguageData.ShowerSimple.description: Chuveiro simples. Requer torre de água. Pode ser aquecido através do deposito térmico. Não requer saída de esgoto.\n65L por lavagem
LanguageData.ShowerSimple_Blueprint.label: simple shower (blueprint)
LanguageData.ShowerSimple_Blueprint_Install.label: simple shower (blueprint)
LanguageData.ShowerSimple_Frame.label: simple shower (building)
LanguageData.ShowerSimple_Frame.description: Simple shower. Requires water from water towers. Can be heated via plumbed hot water tanks. Does not require a sewage outlet.\n65L per wash
LanguageData.ShowerAdvStuff.label: chuveiro elétrico
LanguageData.ShowerAdvStuff.description: Possui uma grande ducha de 110mm 4 pulverizado para relaxar os músculos doloridos.
LanguageData.ShowerAdvStuff_Blueprint.label: power shower (blueprint)
LanguageData.ShowerAdvStuff_Blueprint_Install.label: power shower (blueprint)
LanguageData.ShowerAdvStuff_Frame.label: power shower (building)
LanguageData.ShowerAdvStuff_Frame.description: Heats water on demand and does not need a hot water tank, cleans twice as fast\n90L per wash
